<title>Lighting Retrofit Project | UAE | TTE Engineering</title>
<meta name="description" content="TTE Engineering's ESCO team replaced all conventional lights to LEDs, and it resulted in annual energy avoidance of 550 MWh, an annual cost avoidance of 10,000 AED, annual savings of ~75% and an annual carbon reduction of 246 tons of CO2." />
